message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'd be interested in. I'm willing to offer it to you for $130.  Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $125.  Let's split the difference and make a deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $125, but I'm still a bit shy of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
